alert.note: Alert for Northern Foot Hills (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS RapidCity (Western South Dakota and Northeastern Wyoming)
info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued December 15 at 2:08AM MST until December 16 at 11:00AM MST by NWS RapidCity
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING IN EFFECT UNTIL 11 AM MST FRIDAY... ...BLIZZARD WARNING IS CANCELLED... * WHAT...Heavy snow. Additional snow accumulations of 3 to 8 inches. Winds gusting as high as 50 mph. * WHERE...The Northern Foot Hills. * WHEN...Until 11 AM MST Friday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. Widespread blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. Gusty winds could bring down tree branches.
info.instruction: A Winter Storm Warning for snow means severe winter weather conditions are expected. This will create dangerous conditions. Road conditions are available on your smartphone from the 5 1 1 app for your state.
